column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////While visiting Chicago on a business trip
column2: was recommended by the concierges at the hotel to go here for pizza. Service was friendly
column4: they suggested we place our order while we wait to be seated. Once seated
column5: service was friendly and efficient. Bruschetta was fabulous and Lou's original pizza was very good. Overall a great experience
column6: I will be back here with family on my next personal trip to Chicago.
